title: [Bad]  You grant eBay rights and all copyright and intellectual property rights to your user content

tosdr.case: [Bad]  You grant eBay rights and all copyright and intellectual property rights to your user content-bad-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Bad]  You grant eBay rights and all copyright and intellectual property rights to your user content.  You waive your moral rights and promise not to go after them.
